statements: SELECT * FROM gaming_accessories_warranty WHERE id = 1;
SELECT accessory_name, warranty_start_date FROM gaming_accessories_warranty WHERE warranty_end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, accessory_name, warranty_end_date FROM gaming_accessories_warranty ORDER BY accessory_name DESC;
SELECT id, accessory_name, service_history FROM gaming_accessories_warranty WHERE service_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT accessory_name, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM gaming_accessories_warranty WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM gaming_accessories_warranty WHERE id = 1;
SELECT accessory_name, warranty_start_date FROM gaming_accessories_warranty WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY warranty_start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_warranties, warranty_end_date FROM gaming_accessories_warranty GROUP BY warranty_end_date;
SELECT accessory_name, service_history FROM gaming_accessories_warranty WHERE warranty_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM gaming_accessories_warranty WHERE warranty_end_date < '2023-01-01' AND service_history IS NOT NULL ORDER BY warranty_end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM warranty_information;
SELECT accessory_name, warranty_start_date FROM warranty_information ORDER BY warranty_start_date DESC;
SELECT id, accessory_name, warranty_start_date FROM warranty_information WHERE accessory_name = 'Case';
SELECT warranty_end_date, warranty_start_date, accessory_name FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT service_date, service_description FROM service_history WHERE accessory_id = 101 ORDER BY service_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT accessory_name, warranty_end_date FROM warranty_information WHERE accessory_name LIKE '%mouse%';
SELECT id, service_date FROM service_history ORDER BY service_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT accessory_id FROM service_history WHERE service_description LIKE '%repair%';
SELECT accessory_name, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM warranty_information ORDER BY warranty_end_date ASC, warranty_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM accessories;
SELECT accessory_name, warranty_start, warranty_end FROM accessories WHERE id = 2;
SELECT accessory_name FROM accessories WHERE warranty_start >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT accessory_name, warranty_provider FROM accessories INNER JOIN warranty_info ON accessories.id = warranty_info.accessory_id;
SELECT * FROM service_history ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT accessory_name, warranty_start, warranty_end FROM accessories WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM accessories WHERE warranty_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT accessory_name, warranty_provider FROM accessories JOIN warranty_info ON accessories.id = warranty_info.accessory_id;
SELECT accessory_name, service_date, service_details FROM accessories JOIN service_history ON accessories.id = service_history.accessory_id;
SELECT accessory_name, warranty_provider, warranty_length FROM accessories JOIN warranty_info ON accessories.id = warranty_info.accessory_id WHERE warranty_length > 2;
SELECT * FROM accessories;
SELECT product_name, warranty_start_date FROM accessories WHERE warranty_end_date IS NULL;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT claim_date, claim_type FROM warranty_claim WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT service_id, technician_name FROM services WHERE service_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM accessories ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT count(*) AS total_claims, claim_type FROM warranty_claim GROUP BY claim_type HAVING total_claims > 5;
SELECT service_date, technician_name FROM services WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY service_date DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, a.product_name, wc.claim_date FROM customers c JOIN warranty_claim wc ON c.customer_id = wc.customer_id JOIN accessories a ON wc.accessory_id = a.accessory_id ORDER BY wc.claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Warranty WHERE manufacturer='Apple';
SELECT accessory_id, name, category FROM Accessory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT service_id, accessory_id, service_date, description FROM ServiceHistory WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM Customer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, accessory_id, purchase_date FROM AccessoryCustomer ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Warranty WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT accessory_id, manufacturer FROM Accessory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM Customer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';

SELECT a.manufacturer, COUNT(a.accessory_id) AS num_accessories FROM Accessory a INNER JOIN AccessoryCustomer ac ON a.accessory_id = ac.accessory_id GROUP BY a.manufacturer ORDER BY num_accessories DESC;

SELECT sh.service_id, sh.service_date, a.name AS accessory_name FROM ServiceHistory sh INNER JOIN Accessory a ON sh.accessory_id = a.accessory_id WHERE sh.description LIKE '%repair%' ORDER BY sh.service_date ASC;
